mainText:
In 2008, after nearly 20 years of working with computers, I was burnt out. It wasn't fun anymore. My brand-new, $3,000 laptop didn't do half of what it was supposed to do right out of the box. 

Then someone said, "You really should have a look at the Macbook Pro..."

I did, and I never looked back.

Thank you, Steve, for making computing fun again. I will miss watching your presentations. I will miss hearing about "one more thing".
author: John
